alert.note: Alert for Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Harrison, southeastern Crawford, east central Perry and northwestern Meade Counties through 330 PM EDT/230 PM CDT/... At 300 PM EDT/200 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Carefree Town, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Carefree Town around 320 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT/700 PM CDT/ for south central Indiana...and central Kentucky.
